benchmark_details.name: O PENREWRITE EVAL
benchmark_details.overview: A novel benchmark that covers a wide variety of rewriting types expressed through natural language instructions, specifically designed for research on cross-sentence text rewriting.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the evaluation of open-ended rewriting, focusing on natural language instructions for cross-sentence text transformations.

data.source: Collected human-generated text rewrites with natural language instructions, covering tasks like formality, paraphrasing, and expansion.
data.annotation: Human annotators attached appropriate instructions to each source text and rewrote them accordingly.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the differences and similarities between model predictions and reference texts.
methodology.interpretation: A higher value of NLI, SARI, GLEU, and Update-ROUGE indicates better performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Previous models evaluated include PaLM, LLaMA, Alpaca, and others, with RewriteLM models outperforming them.
methodology.validation: Empirical studies were conducted to evaluate model performance on the O PENREWRITE EVAL benchmark.
